basics.name: Wolfram Knan
basics.label: Senior Full-Stack/Backend Engineer
basics.summary: I am an experienced and passionate senior software developer. I have a Bachelor's degree in Applied Computer Science with a specialization in Data Science and more than 7 years of professional work experience in different industries. I have experience with various programming languages, frameworks and tools among others in Java, TypeScript, Go, Python, Vue, React, Docker, Kubernetes and many more. I’m always interested new technologies. I am a creative and motivated team player.

work.summary: Software development and consulting for frontend and backend software
highlights: New development of a Costume Rental Management Software (Vue, TypeScript, JakartaEE, Lombok, Quarkus, Docker, Linux, Cypress)
Vue.js frontends for managing manufacturing orders and a question manager (Vue.js, Java Camel, and TypeScript, Quarkus)
Golang template service for automatic microservice generation (Go, Gin, GitHub Actions, React, TypeScript, Java Spring, Stencil, K8s)
Golang bootstrap microservice for CI/CD infrastructure provisioning
Site Reliability Engineering (CI/CD pipelines, K8s, Tekton, GitHub, Python) ensuring performance, resilience, and system availability
Open-source platform development Backstage.io (Node, K8s, Tekton)
Implementation of an automated Scrum and fast-reporting with data from various APIs (TypeScript, React, Angular, Prometheus, Jira, Grafana, SonarIQ, Nexus …)
Implementation of a technology radar (React, d3.js, radar.js)
New/further development of Product Information System (Vue, Java)
Database migration from PostgreSQL to MS SQL Server (SQL)
Achieving measurable results such as cost reduction and performance improvement for developers and data managers
Programming in SAP Finance, Controlling and HR
Cashflow analysis: overview of profitability for individual products

Implmenetation of mobile apps in scanner handhelds for intralogistic warehouse processes like inventory management, inbound, stock transfer, ad-hoc movements, information for storage bins and handling units.
Programming in SAP EWM
Programming extensions in SAP Sales, Materials Management and HR
Integration and development of interfaces with an enterprise-service-bus
Setting up the Fiori launchpad platform
Programming of SAP IS-H solutions, subscreens and GUI's
Implementation of the new release management in hospitals §301 SGB

awards.title: B.Sc. thesis
awards.summary: Permanent exhibition of my thesis in the university library 'Evaluation of a BPMN-system and implementation of selected processes in a financial services company'

awards.title: Third place
awards.summary: My team won third place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.

awards.title: Erasmus+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to study abroad at the Ploytechnicum Institute Porto in Portugal for 6 months.
